Introduction
========================================================

### Mexico Choropleths!

Here's a choropleth of Mexican states:

```{r}
library(mxmaps)
library(viridis)
library(ggplot2)
df = data.frame(region=unique(mxstate.map$region),
                value=sample(as.numeric(unique(mxstate.map$region))))
df$region <- as.character(df$region)
mxstate_choropleth(df, num_colors = 1) +
  scale_fill_viridis()
```

Here's another one of Mexican municipios (similar to counties):

```{r}
df = data.frame(region=unique(mxmunicipio.map$region),
                value=sample(as.numeric(unique(mxmunicipio.map$region))))
df$region <- as.character(df$region)
mxmunicipio_choropleth(df, num_colors = 1) +
  scale_fill_viridis()
```
